faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 285 calories for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one slice of pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: About 12 g of protein per slice.

faqs.q: Does pepperoni pizza have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 700 mg per slice due to cheese and processed meat.

faqs.q: How do carbs break down in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Roughly 35 g total carbs, with 2 g fiber and 4 g sugars per slice.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in pepperoni pizza?
faqs.a: Opt for thin crust or fewer toppings to cut 30-60 calories per slice.
